import pandas as pd
import os
import fnmatch
import numpy as np

def restore_df_main():
    df_main = read_file('/Users/emrecalisir/git/cortico/discovery/df_main.csv',',',['datetime', 'ID', 'user_id', 't_sentiment', 't_stance', 'nbr_retweet',
       'nbr_favorite', 'nbr_reply', 'remain_confidence', 'leave_confidence'],
                     dtype={'datetime':object, 'ID':object,'user_id':object,'t_sentiment':object,'t_stance':object,'nbr_retweet':object
                           ,'nbr_favorite':object,'nbr_reply':object,'remain_confidence':object,'leave_confidence':object})
    return df_main

df_main = df_main[df_main.t_sentiment!='GhanaGuardian AutoPost']
df_main = df_main[df_main.t_sentiment!='Twitter Web Client']
df_main = df_main[df_main.t_sentiment!='False']

source:
df_main = None
for f in os.listdir('/Users/emrecalisir/git/cortico/discovery/'):
    if fnmatch.fnmatch(f, '*pred_sep9.csv'):
    #if fnmatch.fnmatch(f, '*testtt*'):
        print(f)

        df = read_file('/Users/emrecalisir/git/cortico/discovery/'+f, "~", ['usernameTweet','ID','tw_lang','url','nbr_retweet',
                                                                                                        'nbr_favorite','nbr_reply','datetime','is_reply','is_retweet',
                                                                                                        'user_id','tw_coordinates','tw_favorite_count','tw_favorited','tw_geo','tw_hashtags','tw_loc_country','tw_loc_fullname','tw_loc_name','tw_loc_type','tw_retweet_count','tw_source','user_created_at','user_default_profile','user_description','user_favourites_count','user_followers_count','user_friends_count','user_geo_enabled','user_lang','user_listed_count','user_location','user_name','user_profile_image_url','user_screen_name','user_statuses_count','user_timezone','user_url','user_utc_offset','user_verified','t_age','t_eth','t_gender','t_sentiment','text_filled','processed_text','remain_confidence','leave_confidence','t_stance'],
                                       dtype={'usernameTweet':object,'ID':object,'tw_lang':object,'url':object,'nbr_retweet':object,
                                              'nbr_favorite':object,'nbr_reply':object,'datetime':object,'is_reply':object,'is_retweet':object,
                                              'user_id':object,'tw_coordinates':object,'tw_favorite_count':object,'tw_favorited':object,'tw_geo':object,
                                              'tw_hashtags':object,'tw_loc_country':object,'tw_loc_fullname':object,'tw_loc_name':object,'tw_loc_type':object,
                                              'tw_retweet_count':object,'tw_source':object,'user_created_at':object,'user_default_profile':object,
                                              'user_description':object,'user_favourites_count':object,'user_followers_count':object,'user_friends_count':object,
                                              'user_geo_enabled':object,'user_lang':object,'user_listed_count':object,'user_location':object,'user_name':object,
                                              'user_profile_image_url':object,'user_screen_name':object,'user_statuses_count':object,'user_timezone':object,
                                              'user_url':object,'user_utc_offset':object,'user_verified':object,'t_age':object,'t_eth':object,'t_gender':object,'t_sentiment':object,'text_filled':'U',
                                              'processed_text':'U','remain_confidence':object,'leave_confidence':object,'t_stance':object
                                       })
        print(df.shape)
        df_col = df[['datetime','ID','user_id','t_sentiment','t_stance','nbr_retweet','nbr_favorite','nbr_reply','remain_confidence','leave_confidence']]
        df_main = pd.concat([df_main,df_col])

df_main = df_main.drop(0,axis=0)
df = None
df_col = None

source:
import numpy as np
def func_positive(group, positive_tw_count_of_user, negative_tw_count_of_user, neutral_tw_count_of_user):
    positive = group['positive']
    negative = group['negative']
    neutral = group['neutral']
    res = positive / (positive+negative+neutral)
    return res

source:
def func_negative(group, positive_tw_count_of_user, negative_tw_count_of_user, neutral_tw_count_of_user):
    positive = group['positive']
    negative = group['negative']
    neutral = group['neutral']
    res = negative / (positive+negative+neutral)
    return res

source:
import numpy as np
def func_remain(group, remain_tw_count_of_user, leave_tw_count_of_user, others_tw_count_of_user):
    leave = group['leave']
    remain = group['remain']
    other = group['other']
    res = remain / (remain+leave+other)
    return res

source:
def func_leave(group, remain_tw_count_of_user, leave_tw_count_of_user, others_tw_count_of_user):
    leave = group['leave']
    remain = group['remain']
    other = group['other']
    res = leave / (remain+leave+other)
    return res

df_users = df_users[df_users.user_id != 'MongoDB shell version v3.6.5']
df_users = df_users[df_users.user_id != 'connecting to: mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017']
df_users['user_id']=df_users['user_id'].str.replace("numberLong","")
df_users['user_id']=df_users['user_id'].str.replace("{","")
df_users['user_id']=df_users['user_id'].str.replace("}","")
df_users['user_id']=df_users['user_id'].str.replace(":","")
df_users['user_id']=df_users['user_id'].str.replace("'","")
df_users['user_id']=df_users['user_id'].str.replace("$","")
df_users['user_id']=df_users['user_id'].str.replace(" ","")
